original_text: But when Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were with him, heard of all the evil that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah had done,
korean_text: 가레아의 아들 요하난과 그와 함께 있는 모든 군 지휘관이 느다냐의 아들 이스마엘이 행한 모든 악을 듣고

sentences.original_text: But when Johanan the son of Kareah,
and all the captains of the forces that were with him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 모든 군대 장관들이,

sentences.original_text: that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah had done,
